title: Insania
description: Insania is a small dialogue driven horror game where you play 3 games. Blackjack, War and Russian Roulette. The goal is to win all 3 games while trying to understand what happened to yourself.

title: Brimfire
description: In Brimfire you walk around as a failed experiment by the witch. The goal is to solve a bunch of different puzzles by manipulating fire. After solving all the puzzles you will finally be free.

title: A* pathfinding
description: The A* pathfinding algorithm is an algorithm similair to dijkstra's algorithm. You overlay a grid over the place where you want to calculate and assign values to nodes in that grid. H cost = estimated distance from current node to end node, G cost = distance between current node and starting node and the F cost = G cost + H cost. After assigning values to the nodes you can calculate the shortest path between the start and end node.
